name: TweenMode
desc: Options that determine whether an animation switches between frames gradually or abruptly.

items.name: case hold
items.desc: An option that indicates a keyframe changes to the next abruptly.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: An option that indicates that a keyframe changes to the next gradually.

items.name: static func == (TweenMode, TweenMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the behavior between frames is equal.

items.name: static func != (TweenMode, TweenMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the behavior between frames isnâ€™t equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of a value by feeding them into the given hasher.
